channel.title: Devolution Revolution v1
channel.description:
Leech if you want! Download Here-[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?e1ziuiowqqd]http://www.mediafire.com/?e1ziuiowqqd[/url] This is Devolution Rev'd up! I went out my way from playing Dodian/Dev to coding it! I have decided to make some changes, to try to make the server new, and better to play. It took a few a days to add, but I think you might like!
{Pictures}
[IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza18.png[/img] There is range Shop, Mage shop There, because people always have hard time finding!
[IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza67.png[/img]
Beginner Npcs Monk of Zamorak's Drop -Zamorak Robetop -Zamorak Bottoms -Iron Scimitar -Strength Amulate -Desert Boots -Zamorak Cape Suit of Armour Drops -Iron Fullhelm -Iron Platebody -Iron Platelegs -Iron 2h Sword -Strength Amulate
[IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza40.png[/img] MIDDLE TRAIN Druids Drop -Druid Robe -Druid Robetop -Black Scimitar -Desert Boots -Saradomin Cape [IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza13.png[/img]
Black Knights Drop -Black Fullhelm -Black Platebody -Black Platelegs -Black 2h Sword -Black Boots
[IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza86.png[/img] Wizards Drop -All Mystic Sets -Rune Scimitar
[IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza69.png[/img] White Knights Drop -Full Initiate -Rune Scimitar
[IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza27.png[/img] Arizon Avatar of Magic Drops -Full Infinity -Teacher Wand -Magic Amulate -Seers Ring -Red Key Arizon Avatar of Strength Drops -Obsidian Maul -Full Rune -Warrior Helm -Theres more but forgot.
[IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza8.png[/img] Ogre Shamen Drops -Full Splitbark
[IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza47.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza80.png[/img] Fareer Drops -Full Dragon -Dragon B, Axe -Dragon Longsword -Dragon Scimmitar -Legends Cape
(FORGOT TO GET PICTURE HE IS BY BARROWS) Arizon Avatar Of Range Drops -Full Snakeskin-Made good for range! -Magic Bow -500 Arrows Minions Drop -50 Arrows
[IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza48.png[/img] Barrows Drop -Barrows You Know...
[IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza41.png[/img] Slash Bash Drops -Berserker Helm -Berserker Ring -Whip -Dragon 2H -Granite Maul -Glory Ammy -Granite Shield
[IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza41.png[/img] FIND SPECIAL NPCS INSIDE!
[IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza53.png[/img] Giant Rock Crab Drops -Full Rock-Shell
[IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza11.png[/img] Skeleton HellHounds Drop -Bone Spear Spiced it up =P -Bone Club Spiced it up =P
[IMG]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/mikeownsu665/SilabGarza55.png[/img] Skeleton Drops -Full Skelly -Whip Minions Drop -Full Shade Robe
Well That is all I wanted to do for V1, but there will be a lot more in V2. Tell me what you think I should improve on, I would like to know.

item.title: Devolution Revolution v1
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

Dude not bad, but this is very basic. Like all you did is switch the client to silabgarza, im sure thats why the items look so “custom” for a devo based source. Good though. And the npc’s not hard to add, even for a beginner lol… I give this a 5.5/10 its not bad, it is pretty good :P. Not dl’ing though.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 25, 2009, 06:46:24 pm[/size][hr][quote=“IceTICKER, post:11, topic:315701”][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=412164.msg3039259#msg3039259 date=1258993678]
I can make this in less than an hour.
[/quote]

Bullshit.[/quote]
Oh that aint bullshit, it does not take rocket-science to replace npc’s and I am sure he could do it in less than an hour. Pfft, it might take a noob an hour maybe, but for pro’s this takes less than 10 minutes…

Read full topic

Well done, you added some wrong textures… Have a look at the willow texture and make it tileable. And also i never seem someone add so many NPC’s and give no credit! Nice Work… (I hope you know im being sarcastic)
